Title: NESG Commends FEC for Ratifying AfCFTA
Description: The Nigerian Economic Summit Group (NESG) has commended the Federal Executive Council (FEC) for approving the ratification of the African Continental Free Trade Area Agreement (AfCFTA) on November 11.
